sentence.Network_en: They suffered the ignominy of defeat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们蒙受了失败的耻辱。

sentence.Network_en: If they were caught, she would be thrown out in disgrace, dismissed with ignominy.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦他们被抓住，她就会名誉扫地，被很不光彩地撤职开除。

sentence.Network_en: Gradually his feeling of ignominy and of rage sank.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的怒火和委屈渐渐烟消云散.

the industry also played an ignominious cameo in second hearing , on AAA-rated investments peddled by Goldman Sachs that subsequently bombed .这个行业在第二次听证会中也扮演了可耻的角色，由高盛公司兜售的AAA级投资品随后便惨败。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French ignominie or Latin ignominia, from in- 'not' + a variant of nomen 'name'

entry.def: Ignominy is shame or public disgrace.

example.ex: If they were caught, she would be thrown out in disgrace, dismissed with ignominy.
example.tran: 一旦他们被抓住,她就会名誉扫地,被很不光彩地撤职开除。

sentences.sentence: "one mistake brought shame to all his family"
"suffered the ignominy of being sent to prison"

auth_sentence.content: He had to suffer the ignominy of being dropped from the team.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had to suffer the ignominy of being dropped from the team.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had to suffer the ignominy of being dropped from the team.

auth_sentence.content: To endure Exile, or ignominy, or bonds, or pain.
auth_sentence.res_content: To endure Exile, or ignominy, or bonds, or pain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To endure Exile, or ignominy, or bonds, or pain.

auth_sentence.content: Developed by French mobile application specialist Presselite, Find My Car puts an end to the ignominy of misplacing your car.
auth_sentence.res_content: Developed by French mobile application specialist Presselite, Find My Car puts an end to the ignominy of misplacing your car.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Developed by French mobile application specialist Presselite, Find My Car puts an end to the ignominy of misplacing your car.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cog同+nomin名称,名字+al……的→adj.同名的,同姓的
ig不+nomin名称,名字+ious……的→不好的名字→可耻的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 名义上的;[金额,租金]微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: nomin名称,名字+al表形容词→adj.名义上的;[金额,租金]微不足道的
denominate[v.命名,取名]+ion表名词→n.命名,[长度,币值的]单位
ig不+nomin名称,名字+y状态→不好的名字→可耻
nomin名称,名字+ee被动的人→被提名的人
de给予+nomin名称,名字+ate表动词→给予名称
nomin名称,名字+ate表动词→v.提名,任命
